name: image
label: Task image
description: An optional image to display above the task.

label: Task description
name: text
description: A guide telling the user how to answer this task.

field.name: question
field.label: Line of text
field.description: Blanks are added with an asterix (*) in front and behind the correct word/phrase. Alternative answers are separated with a forward slash (/). You may add a textual tip, using a colon (:) in front of the tip. Example: H5P content may be edited using a *browser/web-browser:Something you use every day*.

label: Feedback text
name: score
description: Feedback text, variables available: @score and @total. Example: 'You got @score of @total possible points'

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings.
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Case sensitive
fields.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.
